resources.string: A cozy bar in an old tram
Formerly known as "Red Marlene" for its glamorous and energetic travesty performances, the bar has retained its unusual charm
Domicil is a venue for jazz and contemporary music that has one of the best classic cocktail bars in the Ruhr area
A former museum, transformed into a multifunctional club and event venue
Spirit has been organizing iconic metal evenings in the Brückstraßenviertel since 1989
The scene for gays / lesbians, travesty and much more
Nice modern restaurant with the Mediterranean beer garden open on summer evenings
Suppenfabrik offers a variety of the best soups of the world
In Hohoffs 800°, there is a huge variety of stirred and cooked beef, chicken and fish variations from at least three continents
In Westpark, the young people meet for barbecues, drinking beer and just hanging out
Westfalenpark has a variety of attractions, including a rose garden, the Florian tower and a cable car
In Rombergpark, there are a variety of different plant species and many quiet corners where you can really make yourself comfortable
